mapper.select: select rownum,q_no,mem_no,ca.sub_ca_name,ca.sub_ca_no,book_ca_name,bca.book_ca_no,q_title, q_content,q_sos,q_up,q_rpt_cnt,q_date,q_admin_state from q q1, (select * from sub_ca) ca,(select * from book_ca) bca where q1.sub_ca_no = ca.sub_ca_no and bca.book_ca_no = q1.book_ca_no and mem_no=#{mem_no}
SELECT * FROM MEM M, (SELECT * FROM GRADE)G WHERE MEM_NO=#{MEM_NO} AND M.GRADE_NO = G.GRADE_NO
